title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 540.1 - Delegation to the presiding justices of the Appellate Division
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 540.1 - Delegation to the presiding justices of the Appellate Division

State Regulations

The presiding justices of the Appellate

Division shall adopt uniform rules to ensure that appeals from pretrial
findings of mental retardation in capital cases pursuant to Laws of 1995, chapter 1, section 20 are expeditiously perfected, reviewed and
determined. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
540.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
